comment.author: 18532986@N07
comment._content:
"Hap Hazard"
Ford-built B-24H-1-FO Liberator
s/n 42-7580
Originally assigned to 703rd BS, 445th BG, 8th AF. She was damaged in combat then repaired and flown back to the U.S. on November 6,1944 to be used for testing. They removed the standard nose turret and installed a experimental Bell power operated turret which was actually a tail turret from a B-26 Marauder.
